derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin delinquent- 'offending', from the verb delinquere, from de- 'away' + linquere 'to leave'

entry.tran: (通常指青少年)常有违法行为的，屡犯轻罪的
entry.def: Someone, usually a young person, who is delinquent repeatedly commits minor crimes.

entry.tran: 拖欠债务的;未缴税款的
entry.def: A delinquent borrower or taxpayer is someone who has failed to pay their debts or taxes.
